info.name: EPS FHIR Dispensing
info.description:
This collection includes requests for releasing, returning, dispensing, withdrawing, and claiming for a prescription using FHIR EPS in the INT environment.

## Authentication

All requests use an authentication bearer token acquired from a CIS2 OAuth call (Not included in this collection). This token should be set to the `accessToken` variable.

## Variables

Each request uses a different subset of the below collection variables. `host` and `accessToken` are required for all collections so will not be specified per request.

- `host` - The url for the FHIR EPS API. For INT this is `https://int.api.service.nhs.uk/electronic-prescriptions/FHIR/R4`
    
- `accessToken` - The CIS2 OAuth2 access token.
    
- `prescriptionId` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription being dispensed, eg. `E5F28A-A83008-96CCCM`.
    
- `NHSNumber` - The NHS number of the patient who's prescription is being dispensed.
    
- `returnReasonCode` - The reason code for a prescription return, eg. `0001`.
    
- `withdrawReasonCode` - The reason code for a dispense notification withdrawal, eg. `MU`.
    
- `prescriptionStatusCode` - The status code of the prescription, eg. `0006`.
    
- `lineItemCount` - The number of line items in the prescription being dispensed (1-4).
    
- `lineItem{N}OrderItemNumber` - The longform ID of line item N of the prescription, eg. `1fc414a2-b0ab-4bdc-9cc5-7877d583c1c4`. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    
- `lineItem{N}StatusCode` - The status code of line item N, eg. `0001`. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    
- `requesterODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization which requested the prescription.
    
- `nominatedODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization which the prescription is nominated to.
    
- `releaseODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization a prescription is released to.
    
- `releaseResponseID` - The `rfc4122` ID of the release message which released this prescription.
    
- `dispenseNotificationID` - The `rfc4122` ID of the dispense notification being withdrawn.

request.description:
Release all prescriptions nominated to a given ODS Code using the `/Task/$release` endpoint.

## Variables

- `nominatedODSCode` - The ODS Code with nominated prescriptions to be released.

Release all prescriptions nominated to a given ODS Code using the `/Task/$release` endpoint.

## Variables

- `prescriptionID` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription to be released.

- `releaseODSCode` - The ODS Code to release the given prescription to.

exec: "0004": "Another dispenser requested release on behalf of the patient",

request.description:
Return a released prescription to Spine using the `/Task#return` endpoint.

## Variables

- `prescriptionID` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription to be returned.

- `NHSNumber` - The NHS Number of the Patient who's prescription is being returned.

- `returnReasonCode` - The reason code for the return.
    
- `releaseResponseID` - The `rfc4122` ID of the release message which released this prescription.
 
- `releaseODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization the prescription was released to.
    
- `requesterODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization which requested the prescription.
    

## Return Reasons

The following return reason codes are supported

| Reason Code | Reason Display |
| --- | --- |
| 0001 | Patient non-attendance |
| 0002 | Unable to dispense medication on prescriptions |
| 0003 | Patient requested release |
| 0004 | Another dispenser requested release on behalf of the patient |
| 0005 | Invalid digital signature |
| 0006 | Rejected due to version problem |
| 0007 | Prescription otherwise invalid or unreadable |
| 0008 | Prescription expired |

exec: // Set line items appropriate to count
// Remove nominated pharmacy for non-nominated prescriptions

request.description:
Send a dispense notification for a prescription using the `/$process-message#dispense-notification` endpoint.

## Variables

- `prescriptionID` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription being dispensed.
    
- `NHSNumber` - The NHS Number of the Patient who's prescription is being dispensed.
    
- `nominatedODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization the prescription is nominated to, if applicable. Leave blank if dispensing a non-nominated prescription.
    
- `prescriptionStatusCode` - The desired status code of the prescription after this dispense notification.
    
- `lineItemCount` - The number of line items in the prescription (1-4).
    
- `lineItem{N}StatusCode` - The desired status codes of the line items of the prescription. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    
- `lineItem{N{OrderItemNumber` - The IDs of the line items of the prescription. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    

## Prescription Status

The following prescription status codes are supported

| Status Code | Status Display |
| --- | --- |
| 0003 | With Dispenser - Active |
| 0006 | Dispensed |
| 0007 | Not Dispensed |

## Line Item Status

The following line item status codes are supported

| Status Code | Status Display |
| --- | --- |
| 0001 | Item fully dispensed |
| 0002 | Item not dispensed |
| 0003 | Item dispensed - partial |
| 0004 | Item not dispensed owing |
| 0005 | Item cancelled |
| 0006 | Expired |
| 0007 | Item to be dispensed |
| 0008 | Item with dispenser |

Withdraw a dispense notification using the `/Task#withdraw` endpoint.

## Variables

- `withdrawReasonCode` - The reason code for the withdrawal.
    
- `prescriptionID` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription who's dispense notification is being withdrawn.
    
- `NHSNumber` - The NHS Number of the Patient who's prescription is being withdrawn.
    
- `requesterODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization which requested the prescription.
    
- `dispenseNotificationID` - The `rfc4122` ID of the dispense notification being withdrawn.
    
- `releaseODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization the prescription was released to.
    

## Withdraw Reasons

The following withdrawal reason codes are supported

| Reason Code | Reason Display |
| --- | --- |
| QU | Quantity Update |
| MU | Medication Update |
| DA | Dosage Amendments |
| PA | Patient Detail Amendments |
| OC | Other Clinical |
| ONC | Other Non-Clinical |

Claim for a prescription using the `/Claim` endpoint.

## Variables

- `prescriptionID` - The shortform prescription ID of the prescription being claimed for.
    
- `requesterODSCode` - The ODS code of the organization which requested the prescription.
    
- `NHSNumber` - The NHS Number of the Patient who's prescription is being withdrawn.
    
- `prescriptionStatusCode` - The current status code of the prescription being claimed.
    
- `lineItemCount` - The number of line items in the prescription (1-4).
    
- `lineItem{N}StatusCode` - The current status codes of the line items of the prescription. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    
- `lineItem{N}OrderItemNumber` - The IDs of the line items of the prescription. Only 1<= N <= lineItemCount is mandatory.
    

## Prescription Status

The following prescription status codes are supported

| Status Code | Status Display |
| --- | --- |
| 0003 | With Dispenser - Active |
| 0006 | Dispensed |
| 0007 | Not Dispensed |

## Line Item Status

The following line item status codes are supported

| Status Code | Status Display |
| --- | --- |
| 0001 | Item fully dispensed |
| 0002 | Item not dispensed |
| 0003 | Item dispensed - partial |
| 0004 | Item not dispensed owing |
| 0005 | Item cancelled |
| 0006 | Expired |
| 0007 | Item to be dispensed |
| 0008 | Item with dispenser |
